FuncDef: This command configures the minimum time that a user is held down after a failed authentication attempt.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum time that a user is held down in hours. Values-1 to 1.
Specifies the minimum time that a user is held down in minutes. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies the minimum time that a user is held down in seconds. Values-0to 59.
